GE07naray__u:1143: <12327.36/2> mamāpy eṣā samutpannā !cintā yā bhavatāṃ matā !!12327.36!
GE07naray__u:1145: <12327.37/2> kathaṃ balakṣayo na syād !yuṣmākaṃ hy ātmanaś ca me

GE07naray__u:1148: <12327.39/1> tatas te brahmaṇā sārdham !ṛṣayo vibudhās tathā !
GE07naray__u:1152: <12327.41/1> ūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭir bāhavaś ca !ekāgraṃ ca mano 'bhavat !
GE07naray__u:1154: <12327.42/1> divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te !tapas taptvā tad uttamam !
GE07naray__u:1156: <12327.43/1> bho bhoḥ sabrahmakā devā !ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1158: <12327.44/1> vijñātaṃ vo mayā kāryaṃ !tac ca lokahitaṃ mahat !
GE07naray__u:1167: <12327.48/2> tatas te vibudhāḥ sarve !brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥ !!12327.48!
GE07naray__u:1169: <12327.49/2> tasmin sattre tadā brahmā !svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayat !
GE07naray__u:1174: <12327.51/1> tato 'tha varado devas !tān sarvān amarān sthitān !
GE07naray__u:1176: <12327.52/1> yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ !sa tathā samupāgataḥ !
GE07naray__u:1181: <12327.54/1> yajñair ye cāpi yakṣyanti !sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1183: <12327.55/1> yo me yathā kalpitavān !bhāgam asmin mahākratau !
GE07naray__u:1190: <12327.58/2> māṃ tato bhāvayiṣyadhvam !eṣā vo bhāvanā mama !!12327.58!
GE07naray__u:1192: <12327.59/2> ebhiḥ samyak prayuktair hi !prīyante devatāḥ kṣitau !!12327.59!
GE07naray__u:1197: <12327.61/2> vasiṣṭha iti saptaite !mānasā nirmitā hi vai !!12327.61!
GE07naray__u:1211: <12327.68/1> yo yathā nirmito jantur !yasmin yasmiṃś ca karmaṇi !
GE07naray__u:1214: <12327.69/2> eṣa mātā pitā caiva !yuṣmākaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1223: <12327.73/101> [X D5 ins.:: tripādahīno dharmaś ca !yuge tasmin bhaviṣyati !12327.73864!
GE07naray__u:1225: <12327.73/3> catuṣpāt sakalo dharmo !bhaviṣyaty atra vai surāḥ !!12327.73!
GE07naray__u:1227: <12327.74/2> prokṣitā yatra paśavo !vadhaṃ prāpsyanti vai makhe !
GE07naray__u:1229: <12327.75/1> tato vai dvāparaṃ nāma !miśraḥ kālo bhaviṣyati !
GE07naray__u:1231: <12327.76/001> [X D7 T1 G1-3.6 after 75, T2 after 74abc:: tatra vadhyanti paśavo !yūpeṣv atra nibadhyate !12327.75865! X]
GE07naray__u:1234: <12327.77/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 ins.:: devā devarṣayaś cocus !tam evaṃvādinaṃ gurum !12327.76866! X]
GE07naray__u:1236: <12327.77/2> kathaṃ kartavyam asmābhir !bhagavaṃs tad vadasva naḥ
GE07naray__u:1237: <12327.78/1> śrībhagavān uvāca: yatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca !tapaḥ satyaṃ damas tathā !
GE07naray__u:1239: <12327.78/3> sa vai deśaḥ sevitavyo !mā vo 'dharmaḥ padā spṛśet !!12327.78!
GE07naray__u:1240: <12327.79/001> vyāsa uvāca: [X D7 T G1-3.6:: guravo yatra pūjyante
GE07naray__u:1242: <12327.79/002> X vastavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhir !yatra dharmo na hīyate
GE07naray__u:1247: <12327.81/1> taṃ devo darśayām āsa !kṛtvā hayaśiro mahat !
GE07naray__u:1254: <12327.84/2> dhātā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ !tvaṃ prabhur jagato guruḥ !
GE07naray__u:1264: <12327.89/1> sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃ !
GE07naray__u:1265: <12327.89/2> sa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryam !

GE07naray__u:1279: <12327.94/2> vācaś ca pataye nityaṃ !saritāṃ pataye tathā !!12327.94!
GE07naray__u:1284: <12327.97/1> evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ !mayā vai jñānacakṣuṣā !
GE07naray__u:1285: <12327.97/2> kathitaṃ tac ca vaḥ sarvaṃ !mayā pṛṣṭena tattvataḥ !!12327.97!
GE07naray__u:1288: <12327.99/1> vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca: ity uktās tu vayaṃ tena !vedavyāsena
GE07naray__u:1293: <12327.101/1> etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ !yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi !
GE07naray__u:1295: <12327.102/1> yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ !yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet !
GE07naray__u:1305: <12327.106/1> kṣemeṇa gacched adhvānam !idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate pathi !
GE07naray__u:1306: <12327.106/2> yo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate !sa tam āpnoti ca dhruvam !!12327.106!
GE07naray__u:1307: <12327.107/001> [X B6 ins.:: ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ !parāśarasutaḥ
GE07naray__u:1313: <12328.1/1> janamejaya uvāca: astauṣīd yair imaṃ vyāsaḥ !saśiṣyo
GE07naray__u:1318: <12328.3/1> vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca: śṛṇu rājan yathācaṣṭa !phalgunasya harir vibhuḥ !
GE07naray__u:1327: <12328.7/2> na hy anyo vartayen nāmnāṃ !niruktaṃ tvām ṛte prabho
GE07naray__u:1330: <12328.9/1> sāṃkhye ca yogaśāstre ca !āyurvede tathaiva ca !
GE07naray__u:1334: <12328.10/3> kathyamānaṃ mayā tāta !tvaṃ hi me 'rdhaṃ smṛtaḥ purā !!12328.10!
GE07naray__u:1338: <12328.12/2> yo 'sau yonir hi sarvasya !sthāvarasya carasya ca !!12328.12!
GE07naray__u:1343: <12328.14/2> tato yajñaś ca yaṣṭā ca !purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ !
GE07naray__u:1348: <12328.16/1> ahnaḥ kṣaye lalāṭāc ca !suto devasya vai tathā !
GE07naray__u:1357: <12328.20/001> [X Ds D8 Cs ins.:: yo 'sau rudraḥ so 'ham asmi !yo 'ham

GE07naray__u:1364: <12328.22/1> yady ahaṃ nārcayeyaṃ vai !īśānaṃ varadaṃ śivam !
GE07naray__u:1365: <12328.22/2> ātmānaṃ nārcayet kaścit !iti me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1367: <12328.23/1> pramāṇāni hi pūjyāni !tatas taṃ pūjayāmy aham !
GE07naray__u:1368: <12328.23/2> yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti !yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu !!12328.23!
GE07naray__u:1371: <12328.25/1> na hi me kenacid deyo !varaḥ pāṇḍavanandana !
GE07naray__u:1374: <12328.26/1> na hi viṣṇuḥ praṇamati !kasmaicid vibudhāya tu !
GE07naray__u:1375: <12328.26/2> ṛtae ātmānam eveti !tato rudraṃ bhajāmy aham !!12328.26!
GE07naray__u:1379: <12328.28/2> sarveṣām agraṇīr viṣṇuḥ !sevyaḥ pūjyaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07naray__u:1382: <12328.30/1> caturvidhā mama janā !bhaktā evaṃ hi te śrutam !
GE07naray__u:1385: <12328.31/1> ye ca śiṣṭās trayo bhaktāḥ !phalakāmā hi te matāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1387: <12328.32/1> brahmāṇaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ ca !yāś cānyā devatāḥ smṛtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1392: <12328.34/1> jānāmy adhyātmayogāṃś ca !yo 'haṃ yasmāc ca bhārata !
GE07naray__u:1395: <12328.35/2> āpo nārā iti proktā !āpo vai narasūnavaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1396: <12328.35/3> ayanaṃ mama tat pūrvam !ato nārāyaṇo hy aham !!12328.35!
GE07naray__u:1400: <12328.37/2> vyāptā me rodasī pārtha !kāntiś cābhyadhikā mama !!12328.37!
GE07naray__u:1402: <12328.38/2> kramaṇāc cāpy ahaṃ pārtha !viṣṇur ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ !!12328.38!
GE07naray__u:1403: <12328.39/1> damāt siddhiṃ parīpsanto !māṃ janāḥ kāmayanti hi !
GE07naray__u:1404: <12328.39/2> divaṃ corvīṃ ca madhyaṃ ca !tasmād dāmodaro hy aham
GE07naray__u:1405: <12328.40/1> pṛśnir ity ucyate cānnaṃ !vedā āpo 'mṛtaṃ tathā !
GE07naray__u:1406: <12328.40/2> mamaitāni sadā garbhe !pṛśnigarbhas tato hy aham !!12328.40!
GE07naray__u:1409: <12328.42/1> tataḥ sa brahmaṇaḥ putra !ādyo ṛṣivaras tritaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1411: <12328.43/1> sūryasya tapato lokān !agneḥ somasya cāpy uta !
GE07naray__u:1420: <12328.46/2> etad bṛhaspatiḥ śrutvā !cukrodha ca śaśāpa ca !!12328.46!
GE07naray__u:1422: <12328.47/2> tasmād andho jāsyasi tvaṃ !macchāpān nātra saṃśayaḥ !!12328.47!
GE07naray__u:1424: <12328.48/2> sa hi dīrghatamā nāma !nāmnā hy āsīd ṛṣiḥ purā !!12328.48!
GE07naray__u:1426: <12328.49/2> prayojayām āsa tadā !nāma guhyam idaṃ mama !!12328.49!
GE07naray__u:1436: <12328.53/4> ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti
GE07naray__u:1437: <12329.1/1> arjuna uvāca: agnīṣomau kathaṃ pūrvam !ekayonī pravartitau !
GE07naray__u:1438: <12329.1/2> eṣa me saṃśayo jātas !taṃ chindhi madhusūdana !!12329.1!
GE07naray__u:1439: <12329.2/1> śrībhagavān uvāca: hanta te vartayiṣyāmi !purāṇaṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07naray__u:1445: <12329.3/5> naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite !
GE07naray__u:1446: <12329.3/6> etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād
GE07naray__u:1448: <12329.3/7> akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ !!12329.3!
GE07naray__u:1454: <12329.5/1> tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja !
GE07naray__u:1455: <12329.5/2> tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat !
GE07naray__u:1456: <12329.5/3> yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1457: <12329.5/4> yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram !
GE07naray__u:1458: <12329.5/5> kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā !
GE07naray__u:1461: <12329.5/8> bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryatae iti !!12329.5!
GE07naray__u:1470: <12329.7/1> na hy ete mantrād dhavanam asti !
GE07naray__u:1472: <12329.7/3> havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1473: <12329.7/4> ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca !
GE07naray__u:1474: <12329.7/5> brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ
GE07naray__u:1475: <12329.7/6> tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti !
GE07naray__u:1476: <12329.7/7> yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti !!12329.7!
GE07naray__u:1478: <12329.8/2> agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti !
GE07naray__u:1479: <12329.8/3> evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti !
GE07naray__u:1480: <12329.8/4> agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati !
GE07naray__u:1484: <12329.10/1> brāhmaṇānāṃ matir vākyaṃ !karma śraddhā tapāṃsi ca !
GE07naray__u:1485: <12329.10/2> dhārayanti mahīṃ dyāṃ ca !śaityād vāry amṛtaṃ yathā
GE07naray__u:1486: <12329.11/1> nāsti satyāt paro dharmo !nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ !
GE07naray__u:1487: <12329.11/2> brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti !pretya ceha ca bhūtaye !!12329.11!
GE07naray__u:1494: <12329.13/2> vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07naray__u:1495: prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1496: <12329.13/3> itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś ca !!12329.13!
GE07naray__u:1497: <12329.14/1> ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1499: <12329.14/3> aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ !
GE07naray__u:1500: <12329.14/4> kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ
GE07naray__u:1502: <12329.15/1> tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ !
GE07naray__u:1504: <12329.15/3> tair asya bhujagaiḥ_1 pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1505: <12329.15/4> pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā !!12329.15!
GE07naray__u:1506: <12329.16/1> amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1508: <12329.16/3> yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti !
GE07naray__u:1510: <12329.17/1> viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo
GE07naray__u:1512: <12329.17/2> sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ
GE07naray__u:1513: <12329.18/1> atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya_1 viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta
GE07naray__u:1514: <12329.18/2> he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ
GE07naray__u:1515: purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam !
GE07naray__u:1517: <12329.18/4> tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti
GE07naray__u:1519: <12329.19/2> putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi !
GE07naray__u:1521: <12329.19/4> sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt !!12329.19!
GE07naray__u:1522: <12329.20/1> hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān
GE07naray__u:1523: <12329.20/2> yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti !
GE07naray__u:1528: <12329.21/3> tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat !
GE07naray__u:1529: <12329.21/4> saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti !!12329.21!
GE07naray__u:1531: <12329.22/2> kva gamiṣyatha āsyatām tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti !
GE07naray__u:1533: <12329.22/4> vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmahae iti !!12329.22!
GE07naray__u:1534: <12329.23/1> atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti !
GE07naray__u:1537: <12329.23/4> ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ
GE07naray__u:1538: somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān !
GE07naray__u:1539: <12329.23/5> athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede
GE07naray__u:1540: <12329.24/1> devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca !
GE07naray__u:1544: <12329.24/5> tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti !!12329.24!
GE07naray__u:1545: <12329.25/1> tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ !
GE07naray__u:1546: <12329.25/2> sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt !
GE07naray__u:1548: <12329.26/1> devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe !
GE07naray__u:1549: <12329.26/2> sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti !
GE07naray__u:1550: <12329.26/3> tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām !
GE07naray__u:1552: <12329.26/5> te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti !
GE07naray__u:1553: <12329.26/501> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt !
GE07naray__u:1554: <12329.26/502> X sahasraṃ varṣāṇām aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām

GE07naray__u:1568: <12329.28/1> tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsusaṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ apsu !
GE07naray__u:1569: <12329.28/2> tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa
GE07naray__u:1570: <12329.29/1> atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva
GE07naray__u:1576: <12329.30/1> atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ !
GE07naray__u:1577: <12329.30/2> nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ
GE07naray__u:1579: <12329.30/3> atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ !!12329.30!
GE07naray__u:1581: <12329.31/2> sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti !
GE07naray__u:1582: <12329.31/3> sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām !
GE07naray__u:1583: <12329.31/4> subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti !
GE07naray__u:1589: <12329.32/3> aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaścit tvam
GE07naray__u:1593: <12329.32/6> tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid evāhobhir iti !
GE07naray__u:1595: <12329.33/1> atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat
GE07naray__u:1596: <12329.33/2> sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca !
GE07naray__u:1597: <12329.33/3> anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya !
GE07naray__u:1599: <12329.34/1> sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat !
GE07naray__u:1601: <12329.34/3> uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti !
GE07naray__u:1602: <12329.34/4> tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti !
GE07naray__u:1605: <12329.35/1> tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva !
GE07naray__u:1606: <12329.35/2> aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam !
GE07naray__u:1607: <12329.35/3> naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti !
GE07naray__u:1614: <12329.36/3> nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva !
GE07naray__u:1615: <12329.36/4> indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā !
GE07naray__u:1619: <12329.37/1> athendrāṇim abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti !
GE07naray__u:1621: <12329.37/3> sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat
GE07naray__u:1622: <12329.38/1> atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs
GE07naray__u:1625: <12329.38/3> tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm !
GE07naray__u:1626: <12329.38/4> sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti !
GE07naray__u:1627: <12329.38/5> sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat
GE07naray__u:1629: <12329.39/2> tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ !
GE07naray__u:1630: <12329.39/3> ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum
GE07naray__u:1632: <12329.39/4> tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu
GE07naray__u:1634: <12329.40/1> tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti !
GE07naray__u:1636: <12329.40/3> indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma !
GE07naray__u:1638: <12329.40/5> tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa !!12329.40!
GE07naray__u:1639: <12329.41/1> tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva
GE07naray__u:1641: <12329.41/201> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Cs.v ins.:: vanitāsu rajaḥ !

GE07naray__u:1648: <12329.42/001> [X D7 T1 G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: nahuṣasya śāpamokṣanimittaṃ devair ṛṣibhir yācyamāno 'gastyaḥ prāha !

GE07naray__u:1651: <12329.42/1> ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ
GE07naray__u:1652: <12329.42/2> sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ
GE07naray__u:1655: <12329.44/1> aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti !

GE07naray__u:1659: <12329.44/5> atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ !

GE07naray__u:1665: <12329.45/3> tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot !

GE07naray__u:1685: <12329.47/3> sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat !
GE07naray__u:1686: <12329.47/4> tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto bhaviṣyatheti !!12329.47!

GE07naray__u:1688: <12329.48/2> tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ !

GE07naray__u:1717: <12330.5/1> naṣṭāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ pūrvam !avindaṃ vai guhāgatām !

GE07naray__u:1737: <12330.15/1> mayā saṃśleṣitā bhūmir !adbhir vyoma ca vāyunā !
GE07naray__u:1738: <12330.15/2> vāyuś ca tejasā sārdhaṃ !vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ tato mama !!12330.15!

GE07naray__u:2612: <12337.15/1> sa pūrvam uktvā vedārthān !bhāratārthāṃś ca tattvavit !
GE07naray__u:2619: <12337.18/2> tataḥ sa prādur abhavad !athainaṃ vākyam abravīt !!12337.18!
GE07naray__u:2624: <12337.21/1> kā śaktir mama deveśa !prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ namo 'stu te !
GE07naray__u:2631: <12337.24/2> uvāca vacanaṃ devo !buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥ !!12337.24!
GE07naray__u:2633: <12337.25/2> tatas tam īśvarādiṣṭā !buddhiḥ kṣipraṃ viveśa sā !!12337.25!
GE07naray__u:2635: <12337.26/2> bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha !sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥ !!12337.26!
GE07naray__u:2637: G1.3.6 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins.:: bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa !yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥ !12337.26902!
GE07naray__u:2638: <12337.27/002> [X D7 T1 G3.6 cont.:: tathākaroc ca dharmātmā !brahmā
GE07naray__u:2643: <12337.28/2> athāsya buddhir abhavat !punar anyā tadā kila !!12337.28!
GE07naray__u:2655: <12337.33/2> mayā hy eṣā hi dhriyate !pātālasthena bhoginā !!12337.33!
GE07naray__u:2666: <12337.39/1> tam uvāca nataṃ mūrdhnā !devānām ādir avyayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2675: <12337.42/1> punas tiṣye ca saṃprāpte !kuravo nāma bhāratāḥ !
GE07naray__u:2694: <12337.48/6> tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ !!12337.48!
GE07naray__u:2702: bhaviṣyati mahāsattva !khyātiś cāpy atulā tava !!12337.51904! X]
GE07naray__u:2705: <12337.52/3> tvam eva bhavitā vatsa !matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ !!12337.52!
GE07naray__u:2707: ins.:: yat kiṃcid vidyate loke !sarvaṃ tan madviceṣṭitam !
GE07naray__u:2708: <12337.53/002> X anyo hy anyaṃ cintayati !svacchandaṃ vidadhāmy aham !12337.52905! X]
GE07naray__u:2709: <12337.53/1> vyāsa uvāca: evaṃ sārasvatam ṛṣim !apāntaratamaṃ tadā !
GE07naray__u:2714: <12337.55/1> tad etat kathitaṃ janma !mayā pūrvakam ātmanaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2718: <12337.57/1> etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ !yan māṃ pṛcchatha putrakāḥ !
GE07naray__u:2720: <12337.58/1> vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca: eṣa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ !saṃbhavo
GE07naray__u:2734: <12337.64/2> na cainam evaṃ jānāti !tamobhūtā viśāṃ pate !!12337.64!
GE07naray__u:2741: <12337.68/1> sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve !
GE07naray__u:2749: <12338.1/1> janamejaya uvāca: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmann !utāho eka eva tu !
GE07naray__u:2750: <12338.1/2> ko hy atra puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ !ko vā yonir ihocyate !!12338.1!
GE07naray__u:2779: <12338.15/2> nityam ugratapās tvaṃ hi !tataḥ pṛcchāmi te punaḥ !!12338.15!
GE07naray__u:2792: <12338.22/1> rudra uvāca: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmaṃs !tvayā sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā !
GE07naray__u:2793: <12338.22/2> sṛjyante cāpare brahman !sa caikaḥ puruṣo virāṭ !!12338.22!
GE07naray__u:2794: <12338.23/1> ko hy asau cintyate brahmaṃs !tvayā vai puruṣottamaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2795: <12338.23/2> etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi !mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me !!12338.23!
GE07naray__u:2796: <12338.24/1> brahmovāca: bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra !ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ !
GE07naray__u:2797: <12338.24/2> evam etad atikrāntaṃ !draṣṭavyaṃ naivam ity api !
GE07naray__u:2802: <12339.1/1> brahmovāca: śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa !puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2804: <12339.2/1> na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ !mayānyair vāpi sattama !
GE07naray__u:2805: <12339.2/2> saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo !jñānadṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ !!12339.2!
GE07naray__u:2807: <12339.3/2> vasann api śarīreṣu !na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ !!12339.3!
GE07naray__u:2813: <12339.6/2> tāni vetti sa yogātmā !tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate !!12339.6!
GE07naray__u:2814: <12339.7/1> nāgatir na gatis tasya !jñeyā bhūtena kenacit !
GE07naray__u:2816: <12339.8/1> cintayāmi gatiṃ cāsya !na gatiṃ vedmi cottamām !
GE07naray__u:2818: <12339.9/1> tasyaikatvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi !sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2829: <12339.12/2> vicared yo yatir yattaḥ !sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum
GE07naray__u:2832: <12339.14/1> tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi !sa nityaṃ nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2833: <12339.14/2> sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ !sarvātmā puruṣo hi saḥ !
GE07naray__u:2835: <12339.15/1> karmātmā tv aparo yo 'sau !mokṣabandhaiḥ sa yujyate !
GE07naray__u:2846: <12339.18/1> yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ !
GE07naray__u:2848: <12339.18/3> yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu !
GE07naray__u:2853: <12339.19/4> tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2860: <12999.31/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 12326.93; Kumbh..ed. after
GE07naray__u:2865: <12999.31/005> X śūdrāḥ śrāddheṣu bhojyante !mayi buddhatvam āgate !
GE07naray__u:2869: <12999.31/009> X na śṛṇvanti pituḥ putrā !na snuṣā naiva mātaraḥ !
GE07naray__u:2870: <12999.31/01> X na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā !vartate hy adharottaram !
GE07naray__u:2872: <12999.31/012> X bhaviṣyati kalau nagno hy !aśuddho varṇasaṃkaraḥ !
GE07naray__u:2876: <12999.31/016> X tasmād ete na saṃbhāṣyā !na spraṣṭavyā itārthibhiḥ !
GE07naray__u:2880: <12999.31/02> X sahāyā brāhmaṇāḥ sarve !tair ahaṃ sahitaḥ punaḥ !
GE07naray__u:2883: <12999.31/023> X ahaṃ paścād bhaviṣyāmi !yajñeṣu nirataḥ sadā !12999.31!
GE07naray__u:2885: Kumbh. ed. ins after 12331.1, V1 after 6:: sarvāśramābhigamanaṃ
GE07naray__u:2887: <12999.32/002> X na tathā phaladaṃ saute !nārāyaṇakathā yathā
GE07naray__u:2888: <12999.32/003> X pāvitāṅgāḥ sma saṃvrṭtāḥ !śrutvemām āditaḥ kathām !
GE07naray__u:2891: <12999.32/006> X devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ kṛtsnair !anyaiś caiva maharṣibhiḥ !
GE07naray__u:2892: <12999.32/007> X dṛṣṭavān nārado yatra !devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim !
GE07naray__u:2893: <12999.32/008> X nūnam etad dhy anumataṃ !tasya devasya sūtaja !
GE07naray__u:2895: <12999.32/01> X yat prādravat punar bhūyo !nārado devasattamau !
GE07naray__u:2896: <12999.32/011> X naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ !kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me !
GE07naray__u:2897: <12999.32/012> X sūta uvāca: tasmin yajñe vartamāne !rājñaḥ pārikṣitasya vai !
GE07naray__u:2903: <12999.32/017> X dhyāyatā bhagavadvākyaṃ !ceṣṭitaṃ kim ataḥ param !
GE07naray__u:2904: <12999.32/018> X badary-āśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī !
GE07naray__u:2905: <12999.32/019> X kiyantaṃ kālam avasat !kāṃ kathām pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
